      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean editMap​(GameMap gameMap, String command)
      Process editmap command from the user loads a map and changes the context to allow the user to execute map editor commands
      static boolean exitGame​(GameMap gameMap, String command)
      Processes exitgame command from the cli Exits the game, terminates program completely
      static boolean gameHelp​(GameMap gameMap, String command)
      Processes help command from the cli Prints available commands according to the current context
      static boolean gamePlayer​(GameMap gameMap, String command)
      Process gameplayer commands from the cli Adds or removes players in the game state
      static boolean loadMap​(GameMap gameMap, String command)
      Processes loadmap command from the cli Loads a map file and changes context to start the game

        Returns:
